with item as (select ? Id from dual), unins as (select 'brn_birth_act' table_name, 'Свидетельство о рождении' DocName, (select count(*) from brn_birth_act g, item where (g.br_act_ch = item.Id or g.br_act_f = item.Id or g.br_act_m = item.Id)) DocCnt from dual union all select 'PATERN_CERT' table_name, 'Установление отцовства' DocName, (select count(*) from PATERN_CERT j, item where (j.pс_ch = item.Id or j.pс_f = item.Id or j.pс_m = item.Id)) DocCnt from dual union all select 'mc_mercer' table_name, 'Заключение брака' DocName, (select count(*) from mc_mercer g, item where (g.MERCER_HE = item.Id or g.MERCER_SHE = item.Id)) DocCnt from dual union all select 'DIVORCE_CERT' table_name, 'Расторжение брака' DocName, (select count(*) from DIVORCE_CERT g, item where (g.DIVC_HE = item.Id or g.DIVC_SHE = item.Id)) DocCnt from dual union all select 'DEATH_CERT' table_name, 'Установление акта о смерти' DocName, (select count(*) from DEATH_CERT g, item where (g.DC_CUS = item.Id)) DocCnt from dual union all select 'UPD_NAME' table_name, 'Перемена имени' DocName, (select count(*) from update_name g, item where (g.CUSID = item.Id)) DocCnt from dual union all select 'UPDATE_ABH_NAME' table_name, 'Восстановление абхазской фамилии' DocName, (select count(*) from UPDATE_ABH_NAME g, item where (g.CUSID = item.Id)) DocCnt from dual union all select 'UPD_NAT' table_name, 'Перемена национальной принадлежности' DocName, (select count(*) from UPD_NAT g, item where (g.CUSID = item.Id)) DocCnt from dual union all select 'ADOPT' table_name, 'Усыновление (удочерение)' DocName, (select count(*) from ADOPTOIN g, item where (g.CUSID_CH = item.Id) or (g.CUSID_F = item.Id) or (g.CUSID_F_AD = item.Id) or (g.CUSID_M = item.Id) or (g.CUSID_M_AD = item.Id)) DocCnt from dual) select sum(DOCCNT) summ from unins

select LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_NAME, to_date(BIRTH_DATE, 'DD.MM.RRRR HH24:MI:SS') BIRTH_DATE, to_number(SEX_CODE) SEX_CODE, TEL_1, TEL_2 FROM XMLTABLE('/РодительскийЭлемент/ПерсональныеДанные' PASSING xmltype(?) COLUMNS last_name varchar2(500) PATH '@Фамилия', first_name varchar2(500) PATH '@Имя', middle_name varchar2(500) PATH '@Отчество', birth_date varchar2(500) PATH '@ДатаРождения', sex_code varchar2(500) PATH '@КодПола', tel_1 varchar2(500) PATH '@Телефон1', tel_2 varchar2(500) PATH '@Телефон2')

select to_number(AREA_CODE) AREA_CODE, AREA_NAME, to_number(CODE_NASPUNCT) CODE_NASPUNCT, NASPUNCT_NAME, STREET, DOM, KORPUS, KV from XMLTABLE('/РодительскийЭлемент/МестоЖительства' PASSING xmltype(?) COLUMNS area_code varchar2(500) PATH '@КодРайона', area_name varchar2(500) PATH '@НаименованиеРайона', code_naspunct varchar2(500) PATH '@КодНасПункта', naspunct_name varchar2(500) PATH '@НаименованиеНасПункта', street varchar2(500) PATH '@Улица', dom varchar2(500) PATH '@Дом', korpus varchar2(500) PATH '@Корпус', kv varchar2(500) PATH '@Квартира')

select GUID, ciuntry_code, ciuntry_name, doc_type, doc_name, seria, kem_vidan, to_date(date_vid, 'DD.MM.RRRR HH24:MI:SS') date_vid, to_date(date_deist, 'DD.MM.RRRR HH24:MI:SS') date_deist, nomer from XMLTABLE('/РодительскийЭлемент/Паспорта/Паспорт' PASSING xmltype((select regexp_replace(?, '<Паспорт[0-9]', '<Паспорт') from dual)) COLUMNS GUID varchar2(500) PATH '@ID', ciuntry_code varchar2(500) PATH '@КодГосударства', ciuntry_name varchar2(500) PATH '@НаименованиеГосударства', doc_type varchar2(500) PATH '@КодВида', doc_name varchar2(500) PATH '@НаименованиеВида', seria varchar2(500) PATH '@Серия', nomer varchar2(500) PATH '@Номер', kem_vidan varchar2(500) PATH '@КемВыдан', date_vid varchar2(500) PATH '@ДатаВыдачи', date_deist varchar2(500) PATH '@СрокДействия')
declare pragma autonomous_transaction; begin insert into CUS_DOCUM_TEMP (id_doc_tp, doc_num, doc_ser, doc_date, doc_period, GUID, DOC_AGENCY) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?); commit; end;

select DOC_SUBDIV, DOC_PERIOD, DOC_AGENCY, DOC_DATE, DOC_SER, DOC_NUM, (select doc_types.name from doc_types where doc_types.code = ID_DOC_TP) ID_DOC_TP, decode(PREF, 'Y', 'Да', 'N', 'Нет') PREF, ID_DOC from CUS_DOCUM_TEMP
select CUS_ADDR.*, (select NAME from COUNTRIES t where t.CODE = CUS_ADDR.COUNTRY) CLONGNAMET from CUS_ADDR where ICUSNUM = ?

select DOC_SUBDIV, DOC_PERIOD, DOC_AGENCY, DOC_DATE, DOC_SER, DOC_NUM, (select doc_types.name from doc_types where doc_types.code = ID_DOC_TP) ID_DOC_TP, decode(PREF, 'Y', 'Да', 'N', 'Нет') PREF, ID_DOC from CUS_DOCUM where icusnum = ?

select /*ПерсональныеДанные*/ (select usr.cusrname from usr where usr.cusrlogname = t.CCUSIDOPEN) oper, t.ccuslast_name, t.ccusfirst_name, t.ccusmiddle_name, to_char(t.dcusbirthday, 'dd.mm.yyyy') || ' 0:00:00' br_date, to_char(t.ccussex) ccussex, /*МестоЖительства*/ (select to_char(raion.code) from raion where raion.name = g.AREA) code_area, (select raion.name from raion where raion.name = g.AREA) name_area, (select to_char(CODE) from NAS_PUNKT where NAS_PUNKT.NAME = g.PUNCT_NAME) punct_code, (select name from NAS_PUNKT where NAS_PUNKT.NAME = g.PUNCT_NAME) punct_name, g.INFR_NAME street, g.dom, g.korp, g.kv from CUS t, cus_addr g where g.icusnum(+) = t.icusnum and t.ICUSNUM = ?
